I watched as waves of Australians voted not to give indigenous Aboriginal peoples a constitutional voice https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/i-watched-as-waves-of-australians-vote-not-to-give-indigenous-aboriginal-peoples-a-constitutional-voice/YVTV3LCIP5BFLFYXJ3UWAC45JY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/i-watched-as-waves-of-australians-vote-not-to-give-indigenous-aboriginal-peoples-a-constitutional-voice/YVTV3LCIP5BFLFYXJ3UWAC45JY/ Anaru EketoneAnaru Eketone is in Australia as they vote down an Aboriginal voice to their constitution Mon, 16 Oct 2023 16:15:00 +0000 Indigenous activist Susanne Levy stands near a sign that opposes the referendum as Australians casted their votes last week. The prospect of an Indigenous Voice to Parliament has bitterly divided Australia's Indigenous minority as well as the wider community. (AP Photo/Rod McGuirk)
